attributes.action: Make more money available to Cumbria County Council to retain local firestations
attributes.additional_details:
This is the link to the consultation page of Cumbria County Council's website.

https://cumbria.citizenspace.com/cumbria-county-council/environment/cumbria-fire-rescue-service-draft-irmp-annual-acti
attributes.background: Cumbria County Council is looking to shut 3 local firestations due to budget cuts. It is a matter of public safety that these firestations remain open due to the remote locations of these villages.
